document.full_text: pai partners, the french buyout firm, has entered into a period of exclusivity with an investment group led by clayton, dubilier & rice and axa private equity to sell the engineering company spie for 2.1 billion euros.
document.title: pai partners to sell engineering firm for $3 billion
lines_and_colors: pai partners, the french buyout firm, has entered into a period of exclusivity with an investment group led by clayton, dubilier & rice and axa private equity to sell the engineering company spie for 2.1 billion euros.
